channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Household waste, 24th August
item.description:
Around 4-5 bags left outside. CI investigated and no evidence. Can this be cleared please

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Star Street, Paddington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge rubbish dump next to screwfix, 24th August
item.description:
Rubbish has been getting dumped in this small alcove next to Screwfix & entrance 2 of milestone house. Its piling up every single day (been there for over 2 weeks already) and its just vile. Please collect and keep our streets clean!!!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 434, Old Kent Road, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins and rubbish blocking pavement, 24th August
item.description:
No. 55 keep all their household waste bins on the public footpath. They have plenty of space in their front garden. This means rubbish is strewn out all over the pavement and prams and wheelchairs can't get past. This has been a problem for many years.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Queens Drive, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Defective Street Lights, 24th August
item.description:
Outside Iceland supermarket, 114 Broadway, Bexleyheath: Please fix the defective street lights as per the attached picture. I reported this on here two years ago in September 2023 and nothing has been done about it. Escalating to local Councillors for their attention.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Townley Road, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti, 24th August
item.description:
Outside Harris Kids, 142 Broadway, Bexleyheath: Please could you remove white graffiti from a green street cabinet as per the attached picture.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 131, Broadway, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress and bed base and frame, 24th August
item.description:
Please dig up this patch of land or fence it off.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sandcliff Road, Northumberland Heath, London

item.title: Broken uneven trip hazard paving slabs, 24th August
item.description:
I fell due to these broken uneven slabs. I’ve tripped here before but this time I actually fell. The damage has been in place for several weeks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 48, Chiswell Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish flytipped, 23rd August
item.description:
Bags of household waste has been flytipped at the start of the alleyway between Gipsy Hill and Becondale Road. Unsure how long it’s been there, at least 3 days.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Becondale Road, West Norwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fallen tree Elmstead woods blocking path, 23rd August
item.description:
A large part of a fallen silver birch tree blocking walkway in Elmstead woods near chain link fence just up from the back of Duggan Drive

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Duggan Drive, Elmstead, London

item.title: Parked in residential parking, 23rd August
item.description:
An unauthorised vehicle has been parked in my allocated residential parking space [Bay 7]. This is causing inconvenience and I request that you take appropriate action to prevent this from happening again.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Martins Place, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loads of cut down tree snd bushes littering the floor, 23rd August
item.description:
At the begining of Slades drive where the numbers star. Someone has cut down bushes and trees that are littering on the floor. They litter from the start of Slades Drive, Chislehurst to number 2 Slades Drive BR7 6JU
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Slades Drive, London

item.title: Graffiti, 23rd August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 104, Broadway, Barnehurst, London

item.title: Street lighting not working at Kimberley Avenue end of Machell Road, 23rd August
item.description:
This street lamp is not working and as a result this end of Machell Road does not feel safe, especially for women. Please fix this as soon as possible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Machell Road, Nunhead, London
